page.title: 13FARMING GOLDSBOROUGH,AREA
page.content: About 18 people are employed on{farms in our area.25 years ago this would have been doubled. The area is mainly{arable}and{mixed {farming.}The main problems on the { arable farm are the{weather,diseases and{pests}such as{aphids.Pigeons,hares and{crows}are also a nuisance. Diseases on the{dairy farms}are{milk {fever,mastitus,abortion}and weather conditions. { Local Cattle markets}are in{Wetherby, {York}and{Boro'bridge (Knaresborough} Cattle market is now closed)There are {fewer}dairy cows and cattle than several years ago,but{sheep}and{pigs} plentiful. { APROXIMATE PRICES:corn Â£120,pigs Â£60, { sheep Â£40,cattle Â£500.
